upcomingEvents.text:
Only When It's Dark Enough Can You See The Stars Closing Reception
with performances by Joyce J. Scott and Shodekeh, and processional directed by Charlotte L. Brathwaite featuring the New Edition Marching Band.
upcomingEvents.location: The former Peale Museum located at 225 N. Holiday Street

upcomingEvents.text: The Contemporary is currently accepting Internship Applications for September 2016 - May 2017. Visit contemporary.org/internshipapplication to apply. The deadline is July 5, 2016.
